original_text: And in the first day there shall be an holy convocation, and in the seventh day there shall be an holy convocation to you; no manner of work shall be done in them, save that which every man must eat, that only may be done of you.
korean_text: 너희에게 첫날에도 성회요 일곱째 날에도 성회가 되리니 너희는 이 두 날에는 아무 일도 하지 말고 각자의 먹을 것만 갖출 것이니라

sentences.original_text: there shall be an holy convocation
there shall be an holy convocation to you
no manner of work shall be done in them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날에는 아무 일도 하지 말라

sentences.original_text: save that which every man must eat
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 각 사람이 먹어야 할 것만 제외하고

sentences.original_text: that only may be done of you
